entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
